titles.title: A bill to limit the level of premium subsidy provided by the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation to agricultural producers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 4/2/2014--Introduced. Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to limit the total amount of premium subsidy paid by the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation to a person or legal entity to $70,000 per crop year.
